channel.title: CVE Feed for weForms -- weForms – Easy Drag & Drop Contact Form Builder For WordPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for weForms -- weForms – Easy Drag & Drop Contact Form Builder For WordPress

item.title: CVE-2023-50896|2024-08-02T22:23:43.895Z -- weforms -- weforms%20%E2%80%93%20easy%20drag%20%26%20drop%20contact%20form%20builder%20for%20wordpress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in weForms weForms – Easy Drag & Drop Contact Form Builder For WordPress allows Stored XSS.This issue affects weForms – Easy Drag & Drop Contact Form Builder For WordPress: from n/a through 1.6.17.
